name: Chomps Big Day Out (minijam81)
description:
Go on a Rampage as CHOMP!  Destroy buildings and earn points. Manage your stamina carefully and earn as many points as possible before time expires. 

Take your last stand and keep fighting for one more push for points and see what your high score can be.

Chomps Big day out is a Submission for Mini Jam 81

Design + Programming       by James W smith / OhDamnitsJam

Asset Credits 

3D Enviroments - Syty Studios

Character Model - https://www.artstation.com/lil_pupinduy/store

Additional 2D art - kenney.nl
